titleStmt.title: Nevves from Ierusalem containing, 1. The beauty of the citie of the great King. 2. The vanitie of the isles of the sonns of men. 3. The comming of the Kings sonne. VVritten by Augustin Taylor, preacher at Hawarden.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Augustine.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Matthewes, dwelling in the parsonage house in Bride Lane, neere Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: "The miserie of the world" (prose) and "The comming of the Kings sonne" each have separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
